# llms-txt-php

> llms-txt-php is a library for writing and reading /llms.txt Markdown files, written in PHP.

You can use llms-txt-php to write, read, and validate /llms.txt files.

llms-txt-php includes a CLI command to validate /llms.txt files.

## Reference

- [/llms.txt proposal](https://llmstxt.org/)
- [llms-txt-php documentation](https://github.com/raphaelstolt/llms-txt-php/blob/main/README.md)
